verbs.description: [V: houston] [ARG1: zoo feast] with the beasts the nov 2 event is a huge fundraiser for the zoo featuring more than 50 local restaurants as well as a performance by the band everclear kathy watkins capone houston zoo everclear hasani hayley halbrook
